original_text: If a person grows fruit to make wine, he must not pick all the fruit. He must not pick up the fruit that drops. The fruit that drops is for the poor people. And it is for those who are foreign. I am the Lord your God.
korean_text: 네 포도원의 열매를 다 따지 말며 네 포도원에 떨어진 열매도 줍지 말고 가난한 사람과 거류민을 위하여 버려두라 나는 너희의 하나님 여호와이니라

sentences.original_text: If a person grows fruit to make wine
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 누군가 포도주를 만들기 위해 과일을 키운다면

sentences.original_text: he must not pick all the fruit
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 모든 과일을 따서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: He must not pick up the fruit that drops
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 떨어진 과일을 줍지 않아야 합니다

sentences.original_text: The fruit that drops is for the poor people
sentences.korean_translation: 떨어진 과일은 가난한 사람들을 위한 것입니다

sentences.original_text: And it is for those who are foreign
I am the Lord your God
